title: Community Bank Lifecycle (Illustrative)

stages.label: De Novo
what_changes: Newly formed bank builds deposit base and loan book
Early financial statements can be noisy; underwriting discipline matters
stages.why_it_matters: Early-stage growth can be mispriced when coverage is limited.
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Credit underwriting errors, funding pressure, or weak local economics can impair outcomes.
stages.investor_takeaway: Focus on franchise quality and risk controls, not just growth rate.

stages.label: Privately Traded
what_changes: Ownership remains private; information flow can be uneven
stages.why_it_matters: Limited liquidity and visibility can contribute to wider valuation discounts.
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Limited governance transparency or limited market access can slow progress.
stages.investor_takeaway: Assess management quality and balance-sheet resilience.

stages.label: OTC Ticker
what_changes: Public quotation begins; trading becomes more observable
Broader investor set can access the name
stages.why_it_matters: A first step toward improved liquidity and price discovery.
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Thin trading can exaggerate volatility and widen spreads.
stages.investor_takeaway: Liquidity may improve gradually; underwriting still drives outcomes.

stages.label: OTCQX
what_changes: Higher reporting/qualification standards versus basic OTC
stages.why_it_matters: Improved visibility can reduce the perceived 'liquidity discount.'
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Regulatory or reporting setbacks can delay progression.
stages.investor_takeaway: Structure can help, but fundamentals remain decisive.

stages.label: NASDAQ
stages.why_it_matters: Listing can improve liquidity and broaden the buyer base.
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Listing does not remove cyclical credit risk or rate sensitivity.
stages.investor_takeaway: Valuation can change with access, but credit discipline still matters.

stages.label: Index Inclusion
what_changes: Passive flows and broader tracking visibility
stages.why_it_matters: Inclusion can mechanically expand the shareholder base.
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Flows can reverse; fundamentals drive long-term results.
stages.investor_takeaway: Avoid assuming index effects are permanent.

stages.label: Acquired
what_changes: M&A becomes a potential endpoint as footprint and economics improve
Outcome depends on cycle, buyer appetite, and asset quality
stages.why_it_matters: M&A can crystallize value, but timing is uncertain.
stages.what_can_go_wrong: Deals can be delayed, repriced, or fail in stressed environments.
stages.investor_takeaway: Treat M&A as a possibility, not a base case.

disclosures: Illustrative framework; not all banks follow this progression.
Lifecycle progression can stall or reverse; liquidity and valuation improvements are not assured.
This material is for informational purposes only and does not constitute investment advice.
